verses.verse: But now thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> that created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, O Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and he that formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: for I have redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, I have called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee by thy name <S%H8034><s%>; thou art mine.

When thou passest through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, I will be with thee; and through the rivers <S%H5104><s%>, they shall not overflow <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee: when thou walkest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through <S%H1119><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, thou shalt not be burned <S%H3554><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; neither shall the flame <S%H3852><s%> kindle <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon thee.

For I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, thy Saviour <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for thy ransom <S%H3724><s%>, Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> for thee.

Since thou wast precious <S%H3365><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>, thou hast been honourable <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and I have loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee: therefore will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> men <S%H120><s%> for thee, and people <S%H3816><s%> for thy life <S%H5315><s%>.

Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: for I am with thee: I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee from the west <S%H4628><s%>;

I will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%>, Give up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; and to the south <S%H8486><s%>, Keep not back <S%H3607><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%> from far <S%H7350><s%>, and my daughters <S%H1323><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>;

Havahn every one <S%H3605><s%> that is called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8737><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>: for I have created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him for my glory <S%H3519><s%>, I have formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him; yea, I have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.
Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that have <S%H3426><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and the deaf <S%H2795><s%> that have ears <S%H241><s%>.

Let all the nations <S%H1471><s%> be gathered <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8738><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and let the people <S%H3816><s%> be assembled <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: who among them can declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> this, and shew <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us former things <S%H7223><s%>? let them bring forth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, that they may be justified <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: or let them hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is truth <S%H571><s%>.

Ye are my witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and my servant <S%H5650><s%> whom I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me, and understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that I am he: before <S%H6440><s%> me there was no 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, neither shall there be after <S%H310><s%> me.
I, even I, am the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and beside <S%H1107><s%> me there is no saviour <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

I have declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and have saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and I have shewed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, when there was no strange <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> god among you: therefore ye are my witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that I am 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>.

Yea, before the day <S%H3117><s%> was I am he; and there is none that can deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of my hand <S%H3027><s%>: I will work <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and who shall let <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it?

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, your redeemer <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; For your sake I have sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and have brought down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all their nobles <S%H1281><s%>, and the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, whose cry <S%H7440><s%> is in the ships <S%H591><s%>.
I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>, your Holy One <S%H6918><s%>, the creator <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, your King <S%H4428><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which maketh <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> in the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and a path <S%H5410><s%> in the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>;

Which bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and horse <S%H5483><s%>, the army <S%H2428><s%> and the power <S%H5808><s%>; they shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, they shall not rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: they are extinct <S%H1846><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they are quenched <S%H3518><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as tow <S%H6594><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye not the former things <S%H7223><s%>, neither consider <S%H995><s%> <S%H8709><s%> the things of old <S%H6931><s%>.

Behold, I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a new thing <S%H2319><s%>; now it shall spring forth <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; shall ye not know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it? I will even make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert <S%H3452><s%>.

The beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me, the dragons <S%H8577><s%> and the owls <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>: because I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert <S%H3452><s%>, to give drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%>, my chosen <S%H972><s%>.
This <S%H2098><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have I formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for myself; they shall shew forth <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my praise <S%H8416><s%>.
But thou hast not called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me, O Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>; but thou hast been weary <S%H3021><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of me, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thou hast not brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me the small cattle <S%H7716><s%> of thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>; neither hast thou honoured <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me with thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>. I have not caused thee to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with an offering <S%H4503><s%>, nor wearied <S%H3021><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee with incense <S%H3828><s%>.

Thou hast bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me no sweet cane <S%H7070><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%>, neither hast thou filled <S%H7301><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>: but thou hast made me to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with thy sins <S%H2403><s%>, thou hast wearied <S%H3021><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me with thine iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
I, even I, am he that blotteth out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy transgressions <S%H6588><s%> for mine own sake, and will not remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy sins <S%H2403><s%>.

Put me in remembrance <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8685><s%>: let us plead <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8735><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>: declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou, that thou mayest be justified <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thy first <S%H7223><s%> father <S%H1><s%> hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thy teachers <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8688><s%> have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me.

Therefore I have profaned <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> to the curse <S%H2764><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to reproaches <S%H1421><s%>.
